questions: Hey!

children.label: Sleeping
questions: Nice!
Catching some zzzzz's

children.label: Yeah it was a good sleep
questions: Nothing bets than a decent sleep

children.label: My diabetes didn't interfere
questions: The gold standard in sleep
Thats great aye!

children.label: Understand why my diabetes was so awesome

questions: Sounds like you have it covered then!

children.label: I needed it
questions: Don't we all at times!

questions: Thats no good!
